alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:31PM CDT until August 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Wheeler to 6 miles north of Hedley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Lutie, Twitty, Allison, Dozier, Lela, Samnorwood, and Kellerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
